description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Lassi recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet Lassi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the yoghurt, milk, sugar, and rose water together until evenly combined and foamy. Or, process the ingredients in a blender until foamy.
Divide the crushed ice among 4 tall glasses, and pour in equal amounts of the lassi. Sprinkle each with a little ground cardamom and serve at once.
